page.title: 17Media
page.content:
We have written a number of reports based on articles found in the local newspaper 'The Derbyshire Times' during the month of June.
{ FIELD DAY TOPS Â£1000
The staff and P.T.A. of Bolsover Welbeck Road Infant School held their annual Field Day on Saturday 22nd June. There was a Fun Run, Fancy Dress, Spot-the-Ball and many different stalls. The money raised will be used to buy a computer.
{ DEATH TRAP
Local councillors are concerned at the increase in the numbers of lorries using local roads since the end of the miners' strike. Some lorries are also exceeding the speed limit.
